## Ctenophores - comb jellies

::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
- gelatinous plankonic animals
- swim with large plates of glued-together cilia
- many of their features evolved independently of other animals
- unique neuronal anatomy with syncytial nerve net
:::
::: {.column width="70%"}

![](movies/Bolinopsis_Jokura.mp4)

:::
:::

:::aside
[Jokura et al. 2019](https://www.cell.com/current-biology/fulltext/S0960-9822(19)31109-1)
:::
